componentConfig:Threads.displayDescription: Number of threads to concurrently process outbound JMS requests and process message exchange repsonses

componentConfig:DefaultRedeliveryHandlin.displayDescription: Default redelivery handling for when no value is supplied in WSDL

componentConfig:ForceConcurrencyMode.displayDescription: Force a concurrency mode which will always override the value specified in WSDL. Use this field if all service units deployed to this BC should use the same settings in order to prevent accidentally omitting a setting.

componentConfig:ForceMaxConcurrentConsum.displayDescription: Force the maximum number of concurrent consumers to a value which will always override the value specified in WSDL. Use this field if all service units deployed to this BC should use the same settings in order to prevent accidentally omitting a setting. The default value of -1 means that no forced value is present and the value in the WSDL should always be used.
